title: Generate bowler profiles from DuckDB + CSV sources
description: Populate bowler profiles: career stats from analytics_ipl_bowling_career (since 2023), phase from analytics_ipl_bowler_phase, tags from player_tags_2023.json, clusters from player_clustering_2023.csv, vs batting hand from bowler_handedness_matchup_2023.csv, vs teams from analytics_ipl_bowler_vs_team. Include bowling classification (arm + type) from squad data.

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
